import React, { useState } from "react"; const LeadModal = ({active, handleModal, token, id, serErrorMessage}) => { const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState(""); const [lastName, setLastName] = useState(""); const [company, setCompany] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [note, setNote] = useState(""); return (

{id ? "Update Lead" : "Create Lead"}

setFirstName(e.target.value)} className="input" required />
setLastName(e.target.value)} className="input" required />
setCompany(e.target.value)} className="input" required />
setEmail(e.target.value)} className="input" required />
setNote(e.target.value)} className="input" required />
) } export default LeadModal;
